definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.english: The record store is timestamped to denote the last time it was modified.
sentences.chinese: 记录存储被盖上时间戳来指示它上次被修改的时间。

sentences.english: No wonder. Last time when I went to Yangmingshan National Park, there was a smell of sulphur in an area.
sentences.chinese: 难怪我上次去阳明山国家公园时，闻到一股硫磺味。

sentences.english: All of us hunger-struck last time.
sentences.chinese: 上次我们全都参加了绝食抗议运动。

sentences.english: Shelly Kagan The guy last time thought he was Shelly Kagan, believed he was professor of philosophy.
sentences.chinese: 上次讲课的家伙认为他是，相信他是哲学教授。

sentences.english: Why didn't you hand in your homework last time?
sentences.chinese: 你上次为什么没交家庭作业。

sentences.english: When she last saw him, he was a sad ─old and tired.
sentences.chinese: 她上次见到他时，他一副惨兮兮的样子苍老而疲惫。

sentences.english: Last game he had brought her out too soon and lost her to a trebuchet.
sentences.chinese: 上次游戏他太早放她出来结果把她输给了一个投石机。

sentences.english: I think their last win was just a fluke .
sentences.chinese: 我认为他们上次获胜只是侥幸罢了。

sentences.english: I doubt he misses me after our last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 不知上次一别之后他可否想念我。

sentences.english: He almost lost his thumb doing it last time, " Glenday said."
sentences.chinese: 在上次表演时，他的手指差点被蛇咬掉。

sentences.english: You had better countercheck that last estimate.
sentences.chinese: 你最好复核一下上次的估价。

sentences.english: The last time you saw that for an ideal gas, the energy only cared about the temperature.
sentences.chinese: 上次你们知道了，理想气体的能量只与温度有关。

sentences.english: I blew it on that last exam.
We just send you over the last of that package.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚刚给您寄过来了上次的那个包。

sentences.english: Professor Jones exhibited all of the items he uncovered during his last expedition.
sentences.chinese: 琼斯教授展出了他上次考察中发现的所有物品。

sentences.english: Its been ten years since i last visited, a little nostalgia swept over me.
sentences.chinese: 从我上次去那里已经有十年了，怀旧感席卷了我。

definition: Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
to speak the truth/truth to tell/frankly
